title: Which has more rooms, Buckingham Palace or Windsor Castle? - Quora

response.answer_text: Which has more rooms, Buckingham Palace or Windsor Castle? I think that Buckingham Palace has more rooms than Windsor Castle. Rather than knowing, this is a deduction on my part. Why do I think this? I know Buckingham Palace is the official London residence of The Queen and she and many royal family members have offices there. It is an administrative headquarters and official State functions are held there.Windsor Castle is where she spends her weekends to get away from “the office”Also, I’ve read the Prince Charles does not want to use Buckingham palace as his “home base” when he becomes king because he thinks it is not sustainable due to its age, condition, size and the cost to maintain it, heat it, etc. He prefers Clarence House, his current residence.So now let’s search the Internet and find out the real answer. Buckingham Palace - Wikipedia Interesting reading. The Palace is not nearly as old as Windsor Castle, but here is the information we need: “The palace has 775 rooms, and the garden is the largest private garden in London.” Also, a bit less serious: Buckingham Palace: 775 rooms, an ATM and more fun facts - HELLO! US Now Windsor Castle: Windsor Castle is much older than Buckingham Palace. It was built by William the Conqueror shortly after his 1066 conquest. “Windsor Castle is one of three official residences of The Queen and has been home to the Sovereign for over 900 years. The castle, after centuries of alterations, contains about 1,000 rooms and occupies 13 acres of land. Windsor castle contains many dungeons which were occupied by many famous prisoners. Biggest House In The World - Property Investment Project Wow, was I wrong! Country Home - 484,000 square feet, 1000 rooms on 13 acres! How would you like to have that listing? According to the British government, Buckingham Palace is 108 meters long across the front, 120 meters deep, and 24 meters high. From the basement to the roof, the palace is 77,000 square meters, or 828,818 square feet, making it the seventh largest palace in the world.Feb 8, 2014 The palace has 775 rooms, Windsor Castle, located in England, Berkshire. The castle's floor area is approximately 484,000 square feet (about 45,000 square metres). The castle, after centuries of alterations, contains about 1,000 rooms and occupies 13 acres of land.
